StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetTakeOneCard]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@cardID uniqueiden..er
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT toc.ID, toc.DatePrepared, toc.FY, mp.SectorDesignator, case when toc2.ID is null then 0 else 1 end as NextFyCard
FROM rssoss.usmc.takeOnecard toc INNER JOIN rssoss.usmc.MapsSector mp ON mp.SectorID = toc.SectorID LEFT JOIN rssoss.usmc.takeOnecard toc2 on toc2.SectorID = toc.SectorID and toc2.FY = toc.FY +1 WHERE toc.id = @cardID
END
